summary: A chambermaid on Corsica is obsessed with chess after seeing a US expat play it lovingly with l'Américaine. She cleans his house and now also plays with him on Tuesdays.
cast: Sandrine Bonnaire|Kevin Kline|Francis Renaud|Jennifer Beals|Valérie Lagrange|Alexandra Gentil|Alice Pol|Élisabeth Vitali|Daniel Martin|Dominic Gould|Laurence Colussi|Didier Ferrari|Valérie Tréjean|François Orsoni|Christine Ambrosini|Anne-Camille Challier|Maxime Delauney|Lionel Tavera
title: La jugadora
